casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bennie MACK. No. 294P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 5, 2006. John Payne, Assistant Attorney General, James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of June 2006 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of June 2006."
